title: Interest subvention likely to push energy efficiency among MSMEs
description: The power ministry has begun discussions on offering interest subvention under the Assistance in Deploying Energy Efficient Technologies in Industries & Establishment (ADEETIE) Scheme for adoption of energy efficient technologies, people aware of the developement said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
